release.action: Invoker Runtime is renamed Mainframe Adapter Runtime.

Deprecated the invoke methods that took java objects. These created dependencies on COBOL binding that are not useful. The Adapter Runtime now works at the raw mainframe data level and is independent of the language binding layer.
Fixed issue 27: Adapters always send the largest payload for variable size input structures.
Changed from wait/notify synchronization to Java 1.5 CountDownLatch.
The invoker uses the new messaging implementation code introduced in 1.2.0.
The invoker now supports multiple input/multiple output. This is needed for CICS containers full support.
The configuration file is now called "legstar-invoker-config.xml" by default.
First version of the Mainframe Invoker Runtime.
